product_name: Eagle Creek Undercover Deluxe Money Belt
long_description: The Eagle Creek Undercover Deluxe Money Belt is a simple waist-worn money belt that has multiple pockets for secure organization. It discreetly carries personal identification and currency. Undercover Deluxe money belt features 2 zippered pockets and 1 slip pocket on back of the waist strap. Soft, adjustable elastic waist strap; additional rear slip pocket cleanly stores waist strap when not in use. Made from durable, lightweight ripstop nylon and moisture wicking, breathable mesh.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Undercover Deluxe Money Belt is a simple waist-worn money belt that has multiple pockets for secure organization. It discreetly carries personal identification and currency.
